[..monetd] $ giverny help network add
Network
	
Advanced Network Config Manager.

Usage:
  giverny network [command]

Available Commands:
  aws         write aws configuration files
  build       build monetd configuration files based on a giverny network file
  dump        Dump the network settings
  list        list configured networks
  location    show the location of the configuration files
  new         new configuration for a multi-node network
  push        push a node onto the named network
  start       start a docker network
  status      shows network status
  stop        stop a network

Flags:
  -h, --help   help for network

Global Flags:
  -v, --verbose   verbose messages

Use "giverny network [command] --help" for more information about a command.
